corrections.name: DY_pTll_reweighting
corrections.description: Weights that are to be applied on DY MC samples. The weights were derived from a mu-mu control region.

inputs.name: order
inputs.description: Order of samples: LO, NLO, NNLO

inputs.name: ptll
inputs.description: Gen-level pTll: Obtained from gen-level Electrons/Muons with status==1, or gen-level Taus with status==2, both also requiring status flag 'fromHardProcess'

corrections.name: DY_pTll_reweighting_N_uncertainty
corrections.description: Just gives the number of uncertainties (varies per DY samples type: 'LO'=madgraph, 'NLO'=amcatnlo, 'NNLO'=powheg). Output must be converted to integer.

inputs.name: order
inputs.description: Order of samples: LO, NLO, NNLO
